{"id":865697272,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1672049339,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/865697272/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        if(x == INT_MIN) return 0;\n        if(x == 0) return 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        bool neg = (x < 0);\n        if(neg) x = -x;\n        cout << int(log10(x))+1 << endl;\n        if(int(log10(x))+1 < 10){\n            while(x != 0){\n                ans = 10*ans + x%10;\n                x = x/10;\n            }\n        }\n        else{\n            string s = to_string(INT_MAX);\n            int temp = x;\n            int i=0;\n            while(x != 0 && x%10 == (s[i]-'0')){\n                i++;\n                x = x/10;\n            }\n            if(x%10 > (s[i]-'0')){\n                ans = 0;\n            }\n            else{\n                while(temp != 0){\n                    ans = 10*ans + temp%10;\n                    temp = temp/10;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        if(neg) ans = -ans;\n\n        return ans;\n    } \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
